Authors: Sudjana A.R.L., Jm H.O., Suprapto F., Husin E., Fajar A.N.
Title: Design of Travel Service System in Indonesia Based on Service-Oriented Architecture
Source title: 2019 7th International Conference on Cyber and IT Service Management, CITSM 2019
Affiliations: BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Sudjana, A.R.L., BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Jm, H.O., BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Suprapto, F., BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Husin, E., BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information, Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Transportation is the most basic thing for people to migrate, especially when Indonesia is an archipelago country. That is why; transportation is absolutely needed for Indonesian. It also helps the tourism activities in Indonesia. Therefore it is necessary to have a service that provides a one-stop travel solution to accommodate tourism activity in Indonesia that provides end to end services based on Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). This research method using literature review and observe the phenomenon. The result of this research is the design of a travel information services system that integrates frontend service and backend service using Service Oriented Architecture. The rich picture consists of 13 entities that integrate with each other to build Jalan.com. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: One Stop Travel Solution; Service Oriented Architecture; Transportation; Travel Information System
Index Keywords: Architecture; Computer architecture; Information services; Quality of service; Tourism; Transportation; End-to-end service; Front-end services; Literature reviews; One stop; research methods; Tourism activities; Travel information system; Travel services; Service oriented architecture (SOA)
